text:
Dan van Husen (30 April 1945 – 31 May 2020) was a German actor. He appeared in some Hollywood movies. He was born in Gummersbach, Germany. Van Husen was known for his roles in "Fellini Casanova", by Federico Fellini, in "Salon Kitty" by Tinto Brass and "Nosferatu the Vampyre" directed by Werner Herzog.
Van Husen died on 31 May 2020 in Somerset, England of COVID-19, aged 75.
